Plan: 1 to add, 1 to drop.

Summary by type:
  privileges: 1 to drop
  column privileges: 1 to add

Privileges:
  - app_user

Column privileges:
  + app_user

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

REVOKE UPDATE ON TABLE sometable FROM app_user;

GRANT UPDATE (somecolumn) ON TABLE sometable TO app_user;
